StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendRein.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendRein.description: Value of stock issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the holder of the stock to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Purchase Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.description: Amount of stock repurchase plan authorized.

StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorize.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Remaining Authorized Repurchase Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorize.description: Amount remaining of a stock repurchase plan authorized.

SubordinatedDebt.label: Subordinated Debt
SubordinatedDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised1.label: Tax Benefit from Stock Options Exercised (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised1.description: Tax benefits realized from the exercise of stock options resulting in reductions in the entity's income taxes, which increases net cash provided by operating activities.

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Four
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year One
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Three
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Two
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

TimeDeposits100000OrMore.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
TimeDeposits100000OrMore.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDeposits100000OrMoreDomestic.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Domestic (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
TimeDeposits100000OrMoreDomestic.description: The aggregate amount of domestic time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

TimeDepositsLessThan100000.label: Time Deposits, Less than $100,000
TimeDepositsLessThan100000.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of less than $100,000.

TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.label: Transfer of Portfolio Loans and Leases to Held-for-sale
TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.description: Value of loans and leases held in the entity's portfolio transferred to loans and leases held-for-sale in noncash transactions.

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Balance
ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.description: Reflects the estimated amount of impairment as of the balance sheet date of recognized servicing assets that are being amortized in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

JuniorSubordinatedNotes.label: Junior Subordinated Notes
JuniorSubordinatedNotes.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTe.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Subordinated Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTe.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInt.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInt.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

FinancingReceivableNonaccrualInterestInc.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, Interest Income
FinancingReceivableNonaccrualInterestInc.description: Amount of interest income on financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

FinancingReceivableNonaccrualNoAllowance.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, No Allowance
FinancingReceivableNonaccrualNoAllowance.description: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedFiveOrMoreY.label: Financing Receivable, Originated, More than Five Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedFiveOrMoreY.description: Amount of financing receivable originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedFourYearsBe.label: Financing Receivable, Year Five, Originated, Four Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedFourYearsBe.description: Amount of financing receivable originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.label: Financing Receivable, Year One, Originated, Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.label: Financing Receivable, Year Two, Originated, Fiscal Year before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.label: Financing Receivable, Year Four, Originated, Three Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.description: Amount of financing receivable originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.label: Financing Receivable, Year Three, Originated, Two Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.description: Amount of financing receivable originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableRevolving.label: Financing Receivable, Revolving
FinancingReceivableRevolving.description: Amount of financing receivable that can be withdrawn, repaid and redrawn.

IncreaseDecreaseInFinanceReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Finance Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInFinanceReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in outstanding loans including accrued interest.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment, Excluding Oil and Gas Property and Timber Property
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, excluding oil and gas property and timber property.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Leasing Arrangements
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from leasing arrangements.

FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.label: Financing Receivable, Unamortized Loan Fee (Cost)
FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.description: Amount of unamortized loan commitment, origination, and other fees (costs) on financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.
